software.aws.rds.jdbc.postgresql.ca

Class ClusterAwareConnectionProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.aws.rds.jdbc.postgresql.ca.ClusterAwareConnectionProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InvocationHandler

    public class ClusterAwareConnectionProxy
extends Object
implements InvocationHandler
    A proxy for a dynamic org.postgresql.core.Connection implementation that provides cluster-aware failover features. Connection switching occurs on communication-related exceptions and/or cluster topology changes.

      • proxyIfReturnTypeIsJdbcInterface

        protected @Nullable Object proxyIfReturnTypeIsJdbcInterface(Class<?> returnType,
                                                            @Nullable Object toProxy)
        If the given return type is or implements a JDBC interface, proxies the given object so that we can catch SQL errors and fire a connection switch.
        Parameters:
        returnType - The type the object instance to proxy is supposed to be
        toProxy - The object instance to proxy
        Returns:
        The proxied object or the original one if it does not implement a JDBC interface

      • failover

        protected void failover()
                 throws SQLException
        Initiates a default failover procedure starting at the given host index. This process tries to connect, sequentially, to the next host in the list. The primary host may or may not be excluded from the connection attempts.
        Throws:
        SQLException - if an error occurs during

      • invoke

        public @Nullable Object invoke(Object proxy,
                               Method method,
                               @Nullable Object[] args)
                        throws Throwable
        Proxies method invocation on connection object. Called when a method is called on the connection object. Changes member variables depending on the Method parameter and initiates failover if needed.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface InvocationHandler
        Parameters:
        proxy - The proxy object
        method - The method being called
        args - The arguments to the method
        Returns:
        The results of the method call
        Throws:
        Throwable - if an error occurs
